scripts.deploy: git pull dev master && git push && node version.js && typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && ng build --prod --base-href=%npm_package_config_prod_url% && npx ngh
scripts.deploy1: git pull dev master && git push && node version.js && typedoc --mode modules -module commonjs --exclude **/*.spec.ts --json src/assets/typedoc-json/doc.json src/assets/core/modules && node ./src/assets/typedoc-json/docConvert.js && ng build --prod --base-href=%npm_package_config_prod_url% && ngh
